alert.note: Alert for Bleckley; Pulaski (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 28 at 10:59AM EDT until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Ocmulgee River near Macon affecting Houston, Jones, Monroe, Twiggs and Bibb Counties. Ocmulgee River at US 341 at Hawkinsville affecting Bleckley and Pulaski Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Ocmulgee River at GA 18 at Dames Ferry affecting Jones and Monroe Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ocmulgee River at US 341 at Hawkinsville. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 26 feet, Moderate flooding begins...with several homes surrounded by flood waters and at least 3 homes begin flooding near Gooseneck Lane and RiverView Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM EDT Tuesday the stage was 7.6 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Thursday afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 27.9 feet early Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 20 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
